text:
Hi, can someone help with this error in the python API?

```Exception: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='<http://identitysso-cert.betfair.com|identitysso-cert.betfair.com>', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/certlogin (Caused by SSLError(SSLError(9, '[SSL] PEM lib (_ssl.c:4067)')))```

elements.text: Hi, can someone help with this error in the python API?
Exception: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='identitysso-cert.betfair.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/certlogin (Caused by SSLError(SSLError(9, '[SSL] PEM lib (_ssl.c:4067)')))

text: Probably a problem with your certificate. How did you generate it?

elements.text: Probably a problem with your certificate

text: Still doesn't seem to work.. does it work with .pem?

resources = trading.race_card.get_race_card(market_ids=[market_id])

text:
What do you get if you run the following Python code?

```import ssl
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_1)
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_2)
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_3)
print(ssl.OPENSSL_VERSION)```

elements.text: What do you get if you run the following Python code?

import ssl
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_1)
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_2)
print(ssl.HAS_TLSv1_3)
print(ssl.OPENSSL_VERSION)
